function_call.name: classify_mitigation
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_mitigations":[{"name":"Accountability and transparency in the allocation of global recovery funds, with a focus on directing investments towards sustainable energy development.","category":"Shift societal priorities from GDP to human well-being, implementing sustainable policies, and promoting a healthy environment"},{"name":"Investing in sustainable productions, low-carbon transportation, and renewable materials; divesting from fossil-fuel activities","category":"Shift societal priorities from GDP to human well-being, implementing sustainable policies, and promoting a healthy environment"},{"name":"Implementing sustainable socio-technical systems, sectorial entry points for transformation, and a systemic approach to sustainable development","category":"Shift societal priorities from GDP to human well-being, implementing sustainable policies, and promoting a a healthy environment"},{"name":"Implementing mutually beneficial policies that address the interconnection between sdgs related to biodiversity conservation, food security, and pandemic prevention","category":"Address inequalities through policy and resource allocation"},{"name":"Implementing policies to prevent deforestation and limit wildlife trade, promoting sustainable land use and intact ecosystems","category":"Incorporating environmental sustainability indicators, promoting conservation practices, and incentivizing sustainable resource use"},{"name":"Implementing sustainable land use policies, promoting biodiversity conservation, reducing resource extraction, and limiting CO2 emissions","category":"Incorporating environmental sustainability indicators, promoting conservation practices, and incentivizing sustainable resource use"},{"name":"Shifting societal priorities from GDP to human well-being, implementing sustainable policies, and promoting a healthy environment","category":"Shift societal priorities from GDP to human well-being, implementing sustainable policies, and promoting a healthy environment"},{"name":"Incorporating environmental health indicators and creating incentives for sustainable environmental practices","category":"Incorporating environmental health indicators and creating incentives for sustainable environmental practices"},{"name":"Incorporating environmental sustainability indicators, promoting conservation practices, and incentivizing sustainable resource use","category":"Incorporating environmental sustainability indicators, promoting conservation practices, and incentivizing sustainable resource use"},{"name":"Enhance public health education and communication, enforce regulations and guidelines, and increase access to healthcare resources","category":"Transparent and accountable leadership, investment in state capacity, and robust public health policies"},{"name":"Transparent and accountable leadership, investment in state capacity, and robust public health policies","category":"Transparent and accountable leadership, investment in state capacity, and robust public health policies"},{"name":"Early recognition of the problem, swift implementation of regulations, and coordination with healthcare authorities","category":"Transparent and accountable leadership, investment in state capacity, and robust public health policies"},{"name":"Promote and incentivize collective actions through education and communication","category":"Enhance public health education and communication, enforce regulations and guidelines, and increase access to healthcare resources"},{"name":"Address inequalities through policy and resource allocation","category":"Address inequalities through policy and resource allocation"},{"name":"Implement strict regulations on air and water quality, invest in pollution control technologies and infrastructure.","category":"Implement strict regulations on air and water quality, invest in pollution control technologies and infrastructure."},{"name":"Provide subsidy, tax exemptions, and workers’ training for transitioning to sustainable sectors, and introduce policies like universal basic income.","category":"Implement strict regulations on air and water quality, invest in pollution control technologies and infrastructure."},{"name":"Promote education and cultural awareness, involve communities in decision-making processes, and provide resources for sustainable adaptation.","category":"Transparent and accountable leadership, investment in state capacity, and robust public health policies"},{"name":"Promote a sense of mutual care for common goods and collaboration, and encourage sustainable consumption patterns","category":"Transparent and accountable leadership, investment in state capacity, and robust public health policies"},{"name":"Promote nature-centered education and awareness programs, emphasize the importance of a healthy biosphere","category":"Transparent and accountable leadership, investment in state capacity, and robust public health policies"},{"name":"Proactive adaptation towards a greener, more sustainable, and equitable society","category":"Shift societal priorities from GDP to human well-being, implementing sustainable policies, and promoting a healthy environment"},{"name":"Implement strict hygiene protocols and remote collaboration practices.","category":"Implement strict hygiene protocols and remote collaboration practices."},{"name":"Targeted education and awareness programs for vulnerable age and marital groups","category":"Enhance public health education and communication, enforce regulations and guidelines, and increase access to healthcare resources"},{"name":"Focused testing and prevention campaigns in clustered areas, improved access to healthcare services","category":"Enhance public health education and communication, enforce regulations and guidelines, and increase access to healthcare resources"},{"name":"Increase the availability of gynecologic oncologist specialists in rural areas, implement telemedicine for specialist consultations, and provide financial assistance for travel to urban centers","category":"Enhance public health education and communication, enforce regulations and guidelines, and increase access to healthcare resources"},{"name":"Raise awareness among primary care providers about the importance of timely referral, improve access to transportation for rural patients, and implement education and training programs for healthcare professionals in rural areas","category":"Enhance public health education and communication, enforce regulations and guidelines, and increase access to healthcare resources"},{"name":"Improve coordination between primary care providers and specialist centers, reduce administrative barriers to specialist referrals, and implement expedited pathways for rural patients with suspected ovarian cancer","category":"Enhance public health education and communication, enforce regulations and guidelines, and increase access to healthcare resources"},{"name":"Implementing proper ventilation systems, air filters, and air purification technologies.","category":"Implementing proper ventilation systems, air filters, and air purification technologies."},{"name":"Enforcing strict sanitation protocols, promoting hand hygiene, and regular cleaning of surfaces.","category":"Enforcing strict sanitation protocols, promoting hand hygiene, and regular cleaning of surfaces."},{"name":"Limiting occupancy, promoting social distancing, and staggered use of communal spaces.","category":"Limiting occupancy, promoting social distancing, and staggered use of communal spaces."},{"name":"Implement targeted, non-coercive community interventions with transparency and public engagement","category":"Implement targeted, non-coercive community interventions with transparency and public engagement"},{"name":"Clear and verified communication from national and international health authorities","category":"Clear and verified communication from national and international health authorities"},{"name":"Implement alternative quarantine measures such as voluntary home quarantine and telehealth concepts","category":"Implement alternative quarantine measures such as voluntary home quarantine and telehealth concepts"},{"name":"Implement new guidelines for funerals to reduce crowding and transmission risk","category":"Implement new guidelines for funerals to reduce crowding and transmission risk"},{"name":"Implement early community mitigation measures and travel restrictions","category":"Implement early community mitigation measures and travel restrictions"},{"name":"Implementation of targeted and efficient future political measures. development of effective herd immunity through vaccination.","category":"Implementation of targeted and efficient future political measures. development of effective herd immunity through vaccination."},{"name":"Conducting empirical evaluation of prevailing contact restrictions and development of region-specific interventions based on socio-economic factors.","category":"Conducting empirical evaluation of prevailing contact restrictions and development of region-specific interventions based on socio-economic factors."},{"name":"Conduct additional individual-level studies to supplement group-level analysis","category":"Conduct additional individual-level studies to supplement group-level analysis"},{"name":"Validation of group-level findings with individual-level studies","category":"Validation of group-level findings with individual-level studies"},{"name":"Implement targeted public health interventions for vulnerable populations","category":"Implement targeted public health interventions for vulnerable populations"},{"name":"Thorough research and statistical analysis to accurately identify and understand the influence of socio-economic factors on COVID-19 transmission.","category":"Thorough research and statistical analysis to accurately identify and understand the influence of socio-economic factors on COVID-19 transmission."},{"name":"Implementation of coordinated regional containment measures and collaboration between neighboring regions to control the spread.","category":"Implementation of coordinated regional containment measures and collaboration between neighboring regions to control the spread."},{"name":"Conducting quantitative investigations to assess the impact of dwelling size, tourism, and sectoral structure on COVID-19 transmission. implement targeted interventions based on the results.","category":"Conducting quantitative investigations to assess the impact of dwelling size, tourism, and sectoral structure on COVID-19 transmission. implement targeted interventions based on the results."},{"name":"Conducting combined studies that investigate both clinical and socio-economic factors","category":"Conducting combined studies that investigate both clinical and socio-economic factors"},{"name":"Conducting in-depth analyses of socio-economic factors at the regional level in germany","category":"Conducting in-depth analyses of socio-economic factors at the regional level in germany"},{"name":"Implementing social distancing measures and restricting large gatherings, improving public health infrastructure","category":"Implementing social distancing measures and restricting large gatherings, improving public health infrastructure"},{"name":"Integrating spatial econometric models to account for spatial spillover effects, analyzing localized outbreaks","category":"Integrating spatial econometric models to account for spatial spillover effects, analyzing localized outbreaks"},{"name":"Incorporating socio-economic covariates into spatial analysis, addressing disparities in access to healthcare and resources","category":"Incorporating socio-economic covariates into spatial analysis, addressing disparities in access to healthcare and resources"},{"name":"Use in conjunction with clinical studies for a comprehensive understanding.","category":"Use in conjunction with clinical studies for a comprehensive understanding."},{"name":"Use statistical methods to estimate the dark figure of unreported cases.","category":"Use statistical methods to estimate the dark figure of unreported cases."}]}
